effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 563,260.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 563,260.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

spells.description:
Equip: Healing an ally has a chance to grant you both a Unifying Ember. When two Unifying Embers contact each other, they erupt into Unifying Flames.

Unifying Flames grants the wearer 1,175 of their highest secondary stat, and others 235 of a random secondary stat.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 563,260.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,592, further increased by 943 while you remain within its light.
Use: Zap yourself for 266,279 Nature damage, gaining 16,473 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
G'Hanir, the Mother Tree
